text: kAqmayE#taq vasI#yAnth syAqdityutta#ralakShmANaqM tasyOpa# daddhyAqd-vasI#yAnEqva Ba#vatiq yaM kAqmayE#taq pApI#yAnth syAqdityadha#ralakShmANaqM tasyOpa# daddhyAdasurayOqni-mEqvainaqmanuq parA# BAvayatiq pApI#yAn Bavati tryAliKiqtA Ba#vatIqmE vai lOqkAstryA#liKiqtaiBya Eqva lOqkEByOq BrAtRu#vyamaqntarEqtya~ggi#rasaH suvaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ~MyaqtaH pu#rOqDASa#H kUqrmO BUqtvA&nuq prAsa#rpaq - [  ] 44
